inpath.title: Input data
inpath.description: The full path to the file containing data

maskpath.title: Mask file
maskpath.description: The full path to the file containing the mask. If this is not provided, the input file is checked to see if it also contains a mask.

complexpath.title: Complex file
complexpath.description: The full path to the file containing the complex data.

outpath.title: Output folder
outpath.description: The full path to the output folder. If an output file isn't specified, the output file will be saved to the same directory as the input data
